message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within $7500. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8200.
